title: NRL WAG Elise Morris, 33, reveals she's pregnant with the couple's second child
text:
Cronulla Sharks star Josh Morris and his wife Elise are expecting their second child.

The couple revealed the happy news on Instagram last month while attending a Sharks presentation night.

Elise also debuted her blossoming baby bump on the night in a black velvet strapless dress.

'Presenting our next Sharkies supporter': Cronulla Sharks star Josh Morris and his wife Elise are expecting their second child. The couple revealed the happy news on Instagram last month, as they attended a Sharks presentation night

'Our first Sharks presentation night,' she wrote in the caption of her social media picture, adding, 'also presenting our next little sharkies supporter who'll be here before the season starts.'

The sweet snap attracted a number of well-wishers, with many fans leaving congratulatory messages for the couple.

Elise and Josh already share a daughter Cali, who was born in November, 2017.

The pair regularly share an insight into glamorous life together on Instagram, with trips to sought-after destinations like New York and Bali.

Big support: The couple married two years ago and Elise is hugely supportive of her husband's career

Growing brood: Elise and Josh already share a daughter Cali, who was born in November, 2017

Josh often gushes over his brood, and previously said that Cali is 'the glue that holds our little family together.'

The duo married two years ago and Elise is hugely supportive of her husband's career.

She regularly cheers him on during games and has even been spotted attending in the pouring rain.
description: Cronulla Sharks star Josh Morris and his wife Elise are expecting their second child.
authors: Caleb Taylor For Daily Mail Australia
